column2: an A.M. Eatery////Woke up hangry around 10:30am on new years day. I knew the line was going to be long
column3: so before everyone in the house woke up
column4: I drove to Snooze to put my name down and was told it'd be a 75 minute wait. Perfect. I drove back home
column8: then hauled the gang to Snooze. Thankfully I live about 5 min. away. Anywho
